Package DataManager

Class UserDBManager

java.lang.Object
Utility.CSVReader
DataManager.UserDBManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
PointsSystem, UserManager
public class UserDBManager extends CSVReader
Manages the storage and retrieval of user information from CSV files.
